plot: A young reclusive painter forms a fragile bond with a journalist who challenges her self-inflicted isolation. Using feather-light camera work, we observe their brief personal universe that threatens to blow away at any moment.
title: Margot
plot_es: A young reclusive painter forms a fragile bond with a journalist who challenges her self-inflicted isolation. Using feather-light camera work, we observe their brief personal universe that threatens to blow away at any moment.
